glsa.title: Scilab: Insecure temporary file usage
glsa.synopsis: An insecure temporary file usage has been reported in Scilab, allowing for symlink attacks.

background.p: Scilab is a scientific software package for numerical computations.

description.p: Dmitry E. Oboukhov reported an insecure temporary file usage within the scilink, scidoc and scidem scripts.

impact.p: A local attacker could perform symlink attacks to overwrite arbitrary files with the privileges of the user running the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Scilab users should upgrade to the latest version:
